snippet.title: Project '06 - Sonic Release
snippet.description:
The third installment of Project '06's demos and officially the full release of Sonic's Trial Campaign!

The demo contains the stages Wave Ocean, Dusty Desert, White Acropolis, Crisis City, Flame Core, Radical Train, Tropical Jungle, Kingdom Valley, Aquatic Base & Tails' Wave Ocean.

(UPDATED TO SILVER RELEASE PATCHED VERSION)
Download:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1W_OOFWVBta8sS5-YhhZmU4yv4Y8_Ig2p/view?usp=sharing
Mirrors:
https://drive.google.com/file/d/13ht2-zuiRthb_tTnYYsPQgAjf8diqt0E/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1-xV-4K8vvORB3szZky_uG7n7cUck-fKU/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1MX7cCqQymmUOnq_V717tcrST0nMDfi8t/view?usp=sharing
ANOTHER Mirror:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/2yn53pixmh8qeh0/Project_06_-_Silver_Release_%2528Patch%2529.zip/file

Found bugs? Glitches? Crashes? Report them all in this form:
https://forms.gle/8aS79ifiim9k67XF7

Editing and composition by ChaosX.
Footage recorded by BeatZ & Sir Giygas:
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEjwges-3BTaWsMwOGJDoGQ
https://twitter.com/SirGiygas
